text:
="preserve">Mojang AB is a Swedish video game company made by Markus Persson, known for making "Minecraft". It started in May 2009. It is currently the company that created and updates "Minecraft" but also develops some other games.
On September 15, 2014, Microsoft bought Mojang for 2.5 billion US dollars. After the deal was made, Markus Persson announced that he would leave Mojang.
